about_the_game:
Nightstar: Alliance Original Soundtrack featuring 10 tracks by Synthwave artist Straplocked!

Featured Tracks

01 - The Stars Caught Us
02 - Nightstar
03 - Ice Planet
04 - Redemption
05 - The Fall from Below
06 - Diamond Dust
07 - The Stars Never Sleep
08 - Cranked
09 - Lasers or Bombs
10 - Alliance Scattered (Bonus track)
11 - All Day Heat (feat. Dana Jean Phoenix) (Bonus Track)
